title: Welcome to my personal website.
intro: My name is Mario and in this blog I want to share with you my projects and interests. I hope you can find something you like and enjoy your visit.
more:
If you want to know more about me and my projects, you can click on the menu on the top-right corner. There you will find detailed information about my skills and experience, as well as links to my most notable works. 
 If you have any questions or comments, don't hesitate to contact me. I am always open to new opportunities and connecting with interesting people.
thanks: Thank you for visiting my website!
contact: If you want to get in touch, feel free to reach out through the contact form or my social media profiles.
